atlantic.title: Is Pussy Riot Helping the Eric Garner Cause or Hijacking It?
atlantic.topComment: As if Pussy Riot ever contibuted to anything positive. Such outrage-fisher exhibitionists rarely do.

atlantic.title: Jeb's Foreign-Policy Problem
atlantic.topComment: I think its absurd and disturbing to criticize Jeb Bush for NOT indulging in religious bigotry and calling for a global reverse-jihad against Islam. The Republicans politicians engaging in this kind of rhetoric are not only basically $#!Ting all over...

atlantic.title: When Schools Simulate Mass Shootings
atlantic.topComment: It's kind of odd that we train them for an event that almost never happens. I remember a recent article about a lockdown in Austin - someone had reported they had seen someone somewhat near the school with a gun in their trunk (which turned out to be...
